description:
Whether it is a long day in the park, or just the toll of many smile-inducing laps, wrist pump is real. The GA3s bring the comfort that Ergon is famous for, to the trails. The integrated mini wing relieves pressure on the ulnar nerve and increases support for your whole hand. As one size doesn’t always fit all, there are 2 sizes to choose from, ensuring confident and comfortable grip.

  • Soft UV-resistant rubber absorbs vibration
  • Wing increases comfort and support by evenly spreading pressure over your whole palm
  • Wing promotes a neutral grip position which relieves pressure on the median nerve and improve circulation on long rides
  • Small are recommended for people who wear a XS-M glove. Large are recommended for people who wear a M-XL glove
  • Single lockring for easy installation
  • Lasered indicators on the lockring help you dial in your cockpit
name: Ergon GA3 Grips
